name: Basic laws Revision v1.8
description:
A bunch of laws for :
- Prevent claiming on the road district
- Pay for stone & Asphalt roads on road district
- Tax for tree cuting and pay for stump removal

properties.Title: Road district claim prevent
properties.UserDescription: Prevent claiming on voted road district. Unclaiming is still possible.
